name: Kimbell Cleaning & Maintenance
description: Website for a local cleaning / maintenance company. Serverless architecture using AWS Amplify. Contact form implemented with AWS Lambda and Google ReCaptcha.

name: dotenv-lint
description: A JavaScript library to identify environment configuration issues in Node.js projects. Compares one or more .env files against a “master” and finds missing or incomplete keys.

name: tetris-ts
description: Tetris clone written in TypeScript. Contains no 3rd party libraries or dependencies. First released as an “Easter Egg” for FreightWise

name: SecureSurvey
description: Dosing diary web app for patients in a medication research study conducted by Mass. General Hospital and niversity of Harvard Medical School. Patients answer a series of questions in various formats for review by the research team. Features SMS reminders for patients and a simple reporting / admin dashboard. The app received approval by an Internal Review Board (IRB) and is still in production as of July 2020.

name: BombShare
description: Facebook app which allows for simultaneous sharing of posts on multiple users’ timelines. The server is implemented using Laravel and interacts with Facebook’s Graph API over OAuth2.
